IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO PROVIDE EDUCATION TO STUDENTS GRADES SIX THROUGH TWELVE.
IRS990.MissionDescription: AN INDEPENDENT, CO-ED SCHOOL PROVIDING EDUCATION TO STUDENTS IN GRADES SIX THROUGH TWELVE.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Intended Use of Endowment Funds:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: THE SCHOOL INTENDS TO USE THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS TO SUPPLEMENT THE ANNUAL OPERATIONS OF THE SCHOOL AS WELL AS FULFILL DONOR RESTRICTIONS PLACED ON ENDOWMENTS.

IRS990ScheduleE.PubViaBroadcastMediaExpln: NOTICE OF NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY PUBLISHED ANNUALLY IN AREA NEWSPAPER.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Procedure for Monitoring Grants in the U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Schedule I, Part I, Line 2: THE SCHOOL MONITORS THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS ON A YEARLY BASIS. TUITION ASSISTANCE AND REMISSION IS AWARDED ON AN ANNUAL BASIS BY A COMMITTEE AND IS BASED UPON STUDENT NEED AND ELIGIBILITY.

IssuerName.BusinessNameLine1: MARYLAND HEALTH AND HIGHER EDUCATIONAL FACILITIES AUTHORITY

Form990ScheduleKPartI.DescriptionOfPurpose: CONSTRUCTION AND RENOVATION OF ATHLETIC FACILITIES

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The audit/financial committee shall review and approve the IRS Form 990 annual tax filing prior to submission, and the full board shall receive a copy of the IRS Form 990 within 30 days of its submission. The Headmaster shall sign and certify that the IRS Form 990 is accurate and complete.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION REQUIRES ALL DIRECTORS, OFFICERS, AND KEY EMPLOYEES TO REVIEW THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND COMPLETE AND SIGN AN ANNUAL DISCLOSURE QUESTIONNAIRE.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The bylaws of Severn School establish a Personnel committee that has general oversight of the School's human resource plan. Specific duties include yearly evaluation of the faculty compensation scales/range as well as the ranges for staff administrators. Competent salary survey(s) of independent and other schools are used to benchmark compensation for faculty compensation. The committee also considers the published salary ranges of the Anne Arundel county public schools. For the administrator compensation levels, the committee uses the data provided by the Association of Independent Maryland Schools (AIMS) if available as a guide. In addition, the committee considers input obtained from other board members, staff, professional advisors, and other informed community leaders in the assessment of the appropriate levels of compensation. The Executive Committee of the Board meets to discuss the compensation package for the Head of School using data provided by AIMS as well as other information they find in their research. The Board of Trustees performs the annual evaluation of the Headmaster. The personnel committee presents its findings and recommendations to the full board for review and approval.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 18
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS FORM 1023 AND FORM 990 AVAILABLE TO PUBLIC INSPECTION UPON WRITTEN REQUEST.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON WRITTEN REQUEST.
